channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BEAM-3244] Flink runner does not respect ParDo's lifecycle on case of exceptions
item.description: The lifecycle of the DoFn is not respected in case of exception in any of the lifecycle methods after setup.
item.summary: Flink runner does not respect ParDo's lifecycle on case of exceptions

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
